result.eng: The governors' board is having a meeting.
result.ga: Tá bord na ngobharnóirí i mbun cruinnithe
result.orig: Tá bord na ngobharnóirí i mbun cruinnithe

result.ponchtml: Tá bord na ngoḃarnóirí i mbun cruinniṫeThe governors' board is having a meeting.

result.eng: There were only three people on board the airplane.
result.ga: Ní raibh ach triúr ar bord an eitleáin
result.orig: Ní raibh ach triúr ar bord an eitleáin
result.html: Ní raibh ach triúr ar bord an eitleáinThere were only three people on board the airplane.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ aċ triúr ar bord an eitleáinThere were only three people on board the airplane.

result.eng: She knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ga: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.orig: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.html: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sí go maiṫ gur iomaí iriseoir a tógaḋ amaċ as an óstán ar ċláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].

result.eng: The board was giving information about the history of the place.
result.ga: Bhí an clár ag tabhairt eolais faoi stair na háite
